Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan are in a must-win situation when they face Canada in match 22 of the ICC T20 World Cup at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium on Tuesday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Maple Leafers, meanwhile, are in third place in Group A with two points in as many games.

Being the lowest-ranked team in the tournament, it's fair to say that not much was expected from them, but they pulled off one of the greatest wins in their cricketing history last time out as they stunned Ireland by 12 runs last Friday.
Others: Fans in the United States and Canada can watch the 2024 T20 World Cup live on WillowTV.
Fubo now includes Willow TV in its sports package.
You can also stream the tournament live on Sling TV, which offers new subscribers $20 off their first month.
